# Allowed dependency licenses (one SPDX id per line). Pipeline fails on any other license.
# Override via env: LICENSE_ALLOWLIST in workflow (comma-separated).
# GPL, AGPL, and unknown are disallowed by default.
MIT
Apache-2.0
BSD-2-Clause
BSD-3-Clause
ISC
CC0-1.0
CC-BY-4.0
BlueOak-1.0.0
MPL-2.0
Python-2.0
